Function: Emit 905 nm pulsed laser for time-of-flight ranging
Detection Method: Built-in photodiode monitor on return pulse amplitude; BIST pulse check at startup and every 100 ms during operation

Function: Emit 905 nm pulsed laser for time-of-flight ranging
Failure Mode: Degraded laser power (drift below -3 dB threshold)
Detection Method: Periodic comparison of measured return signal strength vs. expected baseline; degradation detected only if below coarse threshold
LFM Contribution: Increases LFM: 40% undetected contributes to latent fault metric

Function: Measure hydraulic brake line pressure for closed-loop brake force control
Failure Mode: Sensor output stuck at last value (internal ADC latch-up)
Detection Method: Alive counter check by ECU; signal gradient plausibility monitor detects static output during dynamic braking; redundant sensor cross-check

Function: Measure hydraulic brake line pressure for closed-loop brake force control
Failure Mode: Sensor offset drift (>2% FS zero-point shift over temperature)
Detection Method: Periodic zero-point recalibration at key-on; detected only if drift exceeds coarse temperature compensation model
LFM Contribution: Increases LFM: 55% undetected contributes to latent fault metric
